nodes.text: A high-rise tower was located in Coronet City, the capital of the planet Corellia, and one of the building's tenants was the founder of Corellia's Beharen Droid Factory. In 3640 BBY, during the Battle of Corellia between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, a damaged Imperial warship clipped the tower, collapsing several floors and nearly toppling the building. The Beharen founder was among the casualties during the incident.
The Coronet high-rise was first mentioned in the Codex entry for the Beharen Droid Factory in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
